I defined an extension point without a schema. I got it trying to define an
extension for this extension point.

The extension point had no id.
Its definition was:
   <extension-point name="...."/>

instead of:
   <extension-point id="...."/>

We'll guard against this NPE.  However, it is unclear to me why you created an 
extension point without the required 'id' attribute.

I made a mistake, but I think the NPE should not happen and an error should be 
returned to the user.

Closing this defect because we opened a general one that should handle this and 
many other similar cases across PDE (see bug 34033).
